short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switches between Octopus Pie with original run comments and the rerun with author commentary

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply click on the extension icon from any Octopus Pie permalink to switch between the original run and the rerun. Octopus Pie by Meredith Gran is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States License. I have no affiliation with the author.

Certain pages, especially the OTSAN minicomic, are not currently working nicely with this extension. More improvements coming soon!
